text: مِّمَّا خَطِيٓـَٰٔتِهِمۡ أُغۡرِقُواْ فَأُدۡخِلُواْ نَارٗا فَلَمۡ يَجِدُواْ لَهُم مِّن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ أَنصَارٗا

translation.en: Because of their sins they were drowned and put into the Fire, and they found not for themselves besides Allah [any] helpers
translation.id: Disebabkan kesalahan-kesalahan mereka, mereka ditenggelamkan lalu dimasukkan ke neraka, maka mereka tidak mendapat penolong selain Allah
